com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.display

接口 BitmapDisplayer

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CircleBitmapDisplayer, FadeInBitmapDisplayer, RoundedBitmapDisplayer, RoundedVignetteBitmapDisplayer, SimpleBitmapDisplayer

    public interface BitmapDisplayer
    Displays Bitmap in ImageAware. Implementations can apply some changes to Bitmap or any animation for displaying Bitmap.
    Implementations have to be thread-safe.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.5.6
    另请参阅:
    ImageAware, LoadedFrom

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void display(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, ImageAware imageAware, LoadedFrom loadedFrom)
      Displays bitmap in ImageAware.

    • 方法详细资料

      • display

        void display(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
             ImageAware imageAware,
             LoadedFrom loadedFrom)
        Displays bitmap in ImageAware. NOTE: This method is called on UI thread so it's strongly recommended not to do any heavy work in it.
        参数:
        bitmap - Source bitmap
        imageAware - Image aware view to display Bitmap
        loadedFrom - Source of loaded image
